name: stargazing (PeachTii)
description:
Kitten is waiting for Bun on the roof so they can stargaze together! Looks like there's a party going on. Help Bun get through the crowd and up to the roof to be with her girlfriend.

Controls: 

w a s d or arrow keys to move

Credits:

  • Made with Bitsy HD 
  • wip

This is my first game, I hope you enjoy it! <3
